Reviews.Title: “Good Value in a good location”
Reviews.Author: Richard_in_England
Reviews.Content: My room was large & airy. Breakfast was great. The WiFi worked ok once I got it translated. The WiFi provider is http://www.hotsplots.de/en/ and you can find setup help under "Support & Downloads" Very good location. Bus stop just down the road for service 249 that will take you to the Zoo station. Also Hohenzollernplatz metro station on the U3 line. The only problem I has was the lack of cleaning. The communal bathroom was not cleaned in the week I was there or my room bin emptied. Apart from that it was great. I would defiantly go back.

Reviews.Title: “Clean, not expensive, but noisy”
Reviews.Author: saulejanusonyte
Reviews.Content: Very nice hostel. Breakfast is very good. Rooms not renovated, but comfortable. Bad things are the hostel's wall are thin, so it is quite noisy. There are no lift.

Reviews.Title: “Very good value for money”
Reviews.Author: copenhagentravel
Reviews.Content: So I booked a room at this hotel, 26 Euro for one night (single room), quite cheap for Berlin - A single room with a shared bathroom. The room was quite big, not luxurious but very clean and with a lot of light. Big, clean bathroom - and I didn't notice the others that I shared it with. - The staff was helpful all the way. - Big free breakfast with bread, different cerals, jam, nutella, coffee, juice etc. More than satisfying. - Only 20 m. or so from a U-bahn so very easy to get into the center. And very handy and convenient when you arrive home at night. Uhlandstrasse is also a great street with shops, restaurants etc. - Very good value for the money. - Nothing really negative to say - hmm.. maybe ... I couldn't make the elevator work but I didn't even ask, so :) - I can't really believe the other negative reviews here - I wouldn't certainly go again.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent budget accomodation-not luxury but comfortable”
Reviews.Author: NA1960
Reviews.Content: i stayed here Easter 2009, staff helpful + friendly.Booked single room 21Euros on booking.com. Was in room 8,washbasin, comfortable bed, sat tv + clean, small yes but good value. Buffet breakfast plenty to eat ham,cheese,jams,rolls,cerals,juice,tea+coffee. I suspect the toilet could get dirty if inconsiderate guests left it in a mess as the staff go early afternoon, but I found the toilet quite acceptable. didnt use shower as I went to the europa thermen day spa. Free wifi worked 100% + good bandwidth was able to watch my home slingbox no problem. Location excellent 3 minutes walk from hohenzollen platz (U3) which seems to run most of the night. Slight annoyances - plumbing from nextdoor ladies loo rattles/gurgles occasionaly. Every body early starters so noisy early not good for lie-ins!

Reviews.Title: “ok”
Reviews.Author: gareth_aethwy
Reviews.Content: For €21 per night it was ok! Food was ok, bit slow on filling the trays up. Room was basic but ok, shower rooms left a bit to be desired! Overall, no real complaints!

Reviews.Title: “terrible!!!!”
Reviews.Author: terabitija
Reviews.Content: Dirty, scruffy and horrible place even for 36EUR... Never again!!! :(

Reviews.Title: “Avoid this hotel”
Reviews.Author: ste_nohype
Reviews.Content: The rooms are dirty and smelly. The toilet is shared at the floor and is always dirty. Some rooms have a shower, which consists in a box installed directly on the carpet floor (needs a pump in order to ensure water flow!). Breakfast is not good and there's not much amount of food. For that price you can definitely find much better accomodation in Berlin.

HotelInfo.Name: Hotel-Pension Uhland am Kurfuerstendamm
HotelInfo.Address: Uhlandstrasse 142, 10719 Berlin, Germany
